import React from "react"; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell, Legend } from "recharts"; const salesData = [ { name: "Mon", sales: 200 }, { name: "Tue", sales: 400 }, { name: "Wed", sales: 500 }, { name: "Thu", sales: 600 }, { name: "Fri", sales: 700 }, { name: "Sat", sales: 800 }, { name: "Sun", sales: 900 }, ]; const demandData = [ { name: "Shirt", value: 30 }, { name: "Dior", value: 10 }, { name: "Sneakers", value: 80 }, ]; const customerData = [ { name: "Returning", value: 69 }, { name: "New", value: 31 }, ]; const COLORS = ["#8b5cf6", "#38bdf8"]; const inventory = [ { name: "Shirt", category: "Clothes", quantity: 5, price: "$20", status: "In Stock" }, { name: "Dior", category: "Perfume", quantity: 0, price: "$45", status: "Out-Stock" }, { name: "Dress", category: "Clothes", quantity: 12, price: "$50", status: "In Stock" }, { name: "Sneakers", category: "Clothes", quantity: 2, price: "$60", status: "Low Stock" }, ]; const recentActivity = [ "Processed sale: 2x Dress", "Generated barcode for Dior", "AI Forecast: High demand for Sneakers next week", "Added new customer: John Doe", ]; export default function Dashboard() { return (
